name: Break & Enter 1.0
description:
This game can only be played with two players. One plays as the burglar the other one as the professor. 

The Bruglar:

 The burglar has to steal the highest value paintings possible in a given time.
The Professor:

The professor has to guide the burglar through the hidden traps of the museum. He can also tell the burglar the value of the paintings. There is a powerbox from where some cameras and traps can be deactivated. The professor can tell the burglar the right switches to click, to deactivate certain cameras and traps.
